serverams36.name: ${random_pet.serverams36.id}
serverams36.user_data:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update
apt-get install -y unzip curl jq dnsutils
apt-get install -y apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl gnupg-agent software-properties-common
curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add -
sudo add-apt-repository  "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable" 
apt-get update
apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
useradd --system --home /etc/consul.d --shell /bin/false consul
mkdir -p /etc/consul.d
chown root:root /etc/consul.d
chmod 0755 /etc/consul.d
mkdir -p /opt/consul
chown consul:consul /opt/consul
chmod 0755 /opt/consul
curl -L https://releases.hashicorp.com/consul/1.7.1/consul_1.7.1_linux_amd64.zip -o /tmp/consul-1.7.1.zip
chown root:root /tmp/consul-1.7.1.zip
chmod 0644 /tmp/consul-1.7.1.zip
unzip -x /tmp/consul-1.7.1.zip -d /usr/local/bin
consul -autocomplete-install
complete -C /usr/local/bin/consul consul
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/consul.d/config.hcl
ui = true
advertise = "{{GetPublicIP}}"
datacenter = "ams3"
data-dir = /opt/consul
FILE_CONTENT
chown consul:consul /etc/consul.d/config.hcl
chmod 0640 /etc/consul.d/config.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/consul.d/server.hcl
server = true
bootstrap_expect = 3
FILE_CONTENT
chown consul:consul /etc/consul.d/server.hcl
chmod 0640 /etc/consul.d/server.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/consul.d/join_lan.hcl
retry_join = ["provider=digitalocean api_token=${var.digitalocean_token} region=ams3 tag_name=server"]
FILE_CONTENT
chown consul:consul /etc/consul.d/join_lan.hcl
chmod 0640 /etc/consul.d/join_lan.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/systemd/system/consul.service
[Unit]
After=network-online.target
Description=HashiCorp Consul - A service mesh solution
Documentation=https://www.consul.io/
Requires=network-online.target
[Service]
ExecReload=/usr/local/bin/consul reload
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/consul agent -config-dir=/etc/consul.d/
Group=consul
KillMode=process
LimitNOFILE=65536
Restart=on-failure
Type=notify
User=consul
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/systemd/system/consul.service
chmod 0644 /etc/systemd/system/consul.service
systemctl start consul
systemctl enable consul
mkdir -p /etc/nomad.d
chown root:root /etc/nomad.d
chmod 0755 /etc/nomad.d
mkdir -p /opt/nomad/data
chown root:root /opt/nomad/data
chmod 0755 /opt/nomad/data
curl -L https://releases.hashicorp.com/nomad/0.10.0/nomad_0.10.0_linux_amd64.zip -o /tmp/nomad-0.10.0.zip
chown root:root /tmp/nomad-0.10.0.zip
chmod 0644 /tmp/nomad-0.10.0.zip
unzip -x /tmp/nomad-0.10.0.zip -d /usr/local/bin
rm /tmp/nomad-0.10.0.zip
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/nomad.d/nomad.hcl
advertise {
    http = "{{GetPublicIP}}"
    rpc = "{{GetPublicIP}}"
    serf = "{{GetPublicIP}}"
}

FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/nomad.d/nomad.hcl
chmod 0644 /etc/nomad.d/nomad.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/nomad.d/datacenter.hcl
datacenter = ams3
FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/nomad.d/datacenter.hcl
chmod 0644 /etc/nomad.d/datacenter.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/systemd/system/nomad.service
[Unit]
Description=nomad
Documentation=http://localhost
[Service]
ExecReload=/usr/local/bin/consul reload
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/nomad agent -server -bootstrap-expect=3 -data-dir=/opt/nomad/data -config=/etc/nomad.d provider=digitalocean api_token=${var.digitalocean_token} region=ams3 tag_name=server
Restart=on-failure
Type=notify
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/systemd/system/nomad.service
chmod 0644 /etc/systemd/system/nomad.service
systemctl start nomad
systemctl enable nomad
